title: Rename legend label 'Candle (day)' to 'Shots (day)' in Straight Shot Trend Graph

requirements.summary: Change legend label from 'Candle (day)' to 'Shots (day)' in StraightShotTrendChart.tsx
acceptanceCriteria: The legend in the Straight Shot Trend Graph displays 'Shots (day)' instead of 'Candle (day)'
No other UI, logic, or files are modified

file_operations.description: Update the legend label for the candlestick series from 'Candle (day)' to 'Shots (day)'. Locate the legend configuration or data series name prop in the chart component and change the string value. Do not modify any other chart properties, logic, or styling.
